channel.title: 508 - How to add ::master?
channel.description:
Does anyone have the code, and can someone explain it to me please? :D
Thanks!
-Mike

item.title: 508 - How to add ::master?
item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

	else if(cmd[0].equals("master")) {
            p.skillLvl[0] = 136;
            p.skillXP[0] = 510000000;

item.title: 508 - How to add ::master?
item.dc:creator: @h4x0r88 h4x0r88
item.description:
@h4x0r88 wrote:

[quote=“r0fl_0wn3d, post:1, topic:303791”]Does anyone have the code, and can someone explain it to me please?

Thanks!

-Mike[/quote]Go into a 508’s commands.java and search for one of these terms:
SetXp
“master”
Setskill

Then copy that entire method and place it in your commands.java
